derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from late Latin expansio(n-), from Latin expandere (see expand)

entry.def: Expansion is the process of becoming greater in size, number, or amount.

example.ex: ...the rapid expansion of private health insurance.
example.tran: 个人健康保险的迅速发展

means.word_mean: 1. the act of increasing (something) in size or volume or quantity or scope
2. a discussion that provides additional information

auth_sentence.content: Last year, BP announced a further huge expansion.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Last year, BP announced a further huge expansion.

auth_sentence.content: But expansion of the universe may be an illusion.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"某种物,用品;人等"; 2. 表名词,"动作或状态等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: accord和谐+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.手风琴
carr=carn肉+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.腐肉
champ+ion人→n.冠军,拥护者,战士
cush垫+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.垫子,软垫
manse住宅+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.大厦,大楼;宅第
product产品+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.生产,产品,作品
scorp原意为一种鱼,后指蝎子+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.蝎子
dismiss解散;开除+ion动作或状态等→n.免职,解雇,不予考虑

concise简明的+ion动作或状态等→n.简明,简洁

create创造+ion动作或状态等→n.创造,创作物
dilapidate倒塌+ion动作或状态等→n.破旧,荒废

discuss讨论+ion动作或状态等→n.讨论,谈论;论述
edit编辑+ion状态→在以前的基础编辑后→版本,版
expanse膨胀扩张+ion动作或状态等→n.扩张,膨胀;张开,伸展
frict摩擦+ion动作或状态等→n.摩擦,摩擦力

obsess迷住,使困扰+ion动作或状态等→n.迷住,困扰

situate使处于+ion动作或状态等→n.情形,境遇

Sentence.sentence: Land Usage: Over the last five decades, improved farming techniques and technologies have helped to significantly increase crop yields along with a 12% expansion of farmed land use.
A further expansion of farming area will adversely impact on the world's natural ecosystems

Over the past two years, the figures on imports and exports seem not to signal a double-dip recession – a renewed decline in the broad level of economic activity in the United States – but an economic expansion.

means.word_mean: 扩大, 扩张, 扩展, 膨胀

sentences.en: Heat causes the expansion of gases.
His big book is an expansion of the little book he wrote before.
sentences.cn: 他这本大部头的书是在他以前写的一本小册子的基础上扩充而成的。

jushi.english: The future expansion of the business calls for two new factories.
jushi.chinese: 将来业务扩大需要新建两个工厂。

jushi.english: His chest is like the expansion of a sea.
jushi.chinese: 他的胸怀像大海一样宽阔。

jushi.english: Heat causes the expansion of gases.
